channel.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
channel.description:
Hey everyone,
I just installed Macromedia Flash Pro 8 and been practicing creating a walking stick-man using the Brush Tool freehand, I don't really like the line tool, Brush tool is better IMHO.
Rate my Stick from 1-10 (First timer) and could anyone give any helpful tips? :D
Link: [url=http://img150.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stickwalk9xk.swf]http://img150.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stickwalk9xk.swf[/url]
PS: I know it can be much better freehand but that is it for now, I will work on the hand later, the hand is just overlapping the other hand when walking.
Thanks, Surajd.[br][size=1]Posted at: May 08, 2006, 12:16:02 am[/size][hr]EDIT: Fixed the arms :D

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @Friday13th Friday13th
item.description:
@Friday13th wrote:

hmm now add some background and create some story maybe ?

Read full topic

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Thanks for all the comments but this is the most simplest way to animate, tweening takes too long and it just looks too stiff and not real

Read full topic

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @jme jme
item.description:
@jme wrote:

If this was coming from a pro, I;d say it sucks but i realise your a begginer. it looks as if you just re-drew the picture each frame. Your best bet is to just create a simple motion tween and move his amrs and laegs and stuff.

That being said, a really big animation in this style would certainly be interesting

Read full topic

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @Got_Shine Got_Shine
item.description:
@Got_Shine wrote:

Its not bad, but what chris said is right. The line tool looks a lot cleaner.

Read full topic

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Pretty good. All accept I don't reccomend brushing the figure. You will get much better outcomes using the line tool. That way, his head doesn't change shape every time

Seeing as it is your first time, I'll give it a very high 5. You can improve a lot.

Read full topic

item.title: [FlashPro8] My first Stick flash =)
item.dc:creator: @Surajd Surajd
item.description:
@Surajd wrote:

Hey everyone,

I just installed Macromedia Flash Pro 8 and been practicing creating a walking stick-man using the Brush Tool freehand, I don't really like the line tool, Brush tool is better IMHO.

Rate my Stick from 1-10 (First timer) and could anyone give any helpful tips?

Link: http://img150.imageshack.us/my.php?image=stickwalk9xk.swf

PS: I know it can be much better freehand but that is it for now, I will work on the hand later, the hand is just overlapping the other hand when walking.

Thanks,
